content: 1st strap turn your work 90 degrees and single_crochet in each st up the side of the strap and over to the front end of strap turn to work down and along the edge of your top to the start join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet fasten_off left side repeat the above step for the other side attaching yarn at the left side point d and working in reverse along and up the front up and over the strap to the back turn and continue working scs* along the back to join with your 1st stitch and fasten_off *don t forget to chain 1 at the top of each wheel to help them keep their shape middle of back and front attach yarn to point e chain 1 single_crochet in same space single_crochet in each st up and over the inside edge of strap and down in the inside of the v neck i worked 3 x slip_stitch instead of scs across the bottom of the v then scs up the v up and over the other strap and turn your work to single_crochet across the last wheels with chain 1 at the top of each join to 1st single_crochet fasten_off final row to complete the wheels along the bottom of your top use the same colour you used for row 1 and attach to the bottom at the join with your top upside down single_crochet 2 *7 double_crochet in the same chain space where the 7 dcs from row 1 were single_crochet 3 repeat from * around the bottom of your top 1 single_crochet to finish join to 1st single_crochet with slip_stitch fasten_off optional bottom edging attach 1st colour between two wheels at or close to the joined side of your top chain 1 row 1 single_crochet in next st chain 1 skip next st single_crochet in next st * chain 1 single_crochet in next st x 4 chain 1 skip next st single_crochet in next st x 3 repeat from * around the bottom of your top finish with an single_crochet chain 1 join to 1st single_crochet with slip_stitch fasten_off unless you plan to reuse this colour note for row 1 - you should have 5 single_crochet over the wheel 4 plus the single_crochet before and 2 single_crochet between the wheels attach 2nd colour to 1st chain space from row 1 chain 1 row 2 single_crochet in same space chain 1 skip next st *single_crochet in chain space chain 1 skip next st repeat from * around bottom of your top join to 1st single_crochet with slip_stitch fasten_off unless you will reuse for next row attach 3rd colour to a chain space between wheels chain 1 row 3 single_crochet in same space single_crochet in next chain space *chain 1 single_crochet in next chain space repeat from * until you are at the centre top of the wheel work an extra single_crochet in this space chain 1 single_crochet in next chain space x 2 single_crochet in next chain space
